Battle Ship

Place your ships, find the enemy, battle till only one remains!

Select Players

Click anywhere to switch players!

Place ships by drag and dropping them into a space on the board, remember, the "head" or top of the ship will be placed where you dropped it. Or, for mobile, you can click a ship to select it, then click the cell you want the "head" of the ship to go. Press the "Rotate" button to rotate the ships before you place them.
Next, wait for your turn and click the space on the opponents board you want to attack. If there are 2 players, after your turn the boards will switch and it will be your opponents turn.

Battle Ship is a strategy game where you and your opponent place 5 ships on your own boards. Then, you each attack the others board, without knowing where the others ships are positioned. You will be notified whether you hit or missed a ship. Take turns attacking each others boards until all your opponents ships are terminated.
